content: learn how to create this cute cow amigurumi with this free cow crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes a few hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini cow from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger cow from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute cow amigurumi size small cow 6 cm / 2 inch size big cow 13 cm / 5 inch link to english cow crochet pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-cow-crochet-pattern/ link to dutch cow crochet pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-koe-knuffel-haken english video tutorial https //youtu be/x1vrdul44zm dutch video tutorial https //youtu be/dhyw2qalqqe
